channel.title: ShOpS !?! & !?! CoDeS
channel.description:
i just need a little bit of help with making shops, codes , ect....
ok so.. i can create an npc but how do i make it so that they have a shop? and how can i make it so they are saying something? please someone reply or point me in the right direction....
also i would like to know how to add codes such as ::starter (giving a new person money) or things like that.
thank you.... ;D

item.title: ShOpS !?! & !?! CoDeS
item.dc:creator: @boarding_on_java boarding on java
item.description:
@boarding_on_java wrote:

go onto your client.java
search for a command e.g
‘‘saveme’’

then under that add your command

Read full topic
